name: WindowsIoT-Utility
body:
### Welcome to WindowsIoT-Utility

This repository is a collection of utilities I have written for Windows 10 IoT Core and am releasing under MIT license.  If you have questions concerning these utilities please contact me (@cmclendon) via GitHub.

Please visit my [blog](http://www.bitunify.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
